website_summaries.verdict: Customers seeking a reasonably priced trash can will find their match in this simple and reliable model.
pros: Smaller, 10-gallon capacity ideal for single individuals and smaller families
Able to fit 13- gallon trash bag
Compact dimensions work well for small spaces
cons: A little too small for some buyers

customer_reviews.title: and I made it look like bullet bill
customer_reviews.text: I bought this can along with some printer-friendly sticker paper, and I made it look like bullet bill... My geeky self is so proud 😅
customer_reviews.author: Dart

customer_reviews.title: Great little can
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a fantastic trash can you need to consider this model. It’s both strong and durable plus it has a swinging lid to keep out pests like children and bugs. I’d buy it again if I needed another but I must recommend it with the highest review possible.
customer_reviews.author: rob225

customer_reviews.title: Goldilocks would choose this trash can
customer_reviews.text: This is not a big, full-sized kitchen garbage, but it's much bigger than a regular bathroom trash. Not too big, not too small, just right. It is medium-large, as far as garbage cans go. We have it in our bathroom as we have a lot of trash from our pets, and it works great. We don't have to constantly change the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Anna K.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and  perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Really good trash can. I use for my dogs wee wee pads. It’s sturdy plastic and swing cover works great, does not get stuck. I was looking for a match for my others and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive trash can
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size trash can for studio apartment. Exactly what I was looking for, fits perfectly under the counter for easy access. Arrived in perfect condition and promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeysma

customer_reviews.title: Been looking for a good sized waste bin for a good price, finally found what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot recommend this more. Trust me, if you are looking for a good size waste bin for a good price, stop your search here. I tried multiple retailers, physical and online, and scoured the craigslists and facebook marketplace, but have not found a better deal then this. The bin and lid combo are perfect for rooms or offices and are made of sturdy material that seem easy to clean. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Majano

customer_reviews.title: Too small and sticky lid
customer_reviews.text: The bin is 26" tall with the lid but only 18.75" tall without the lid. It was too small to use in our kitchen. To make matters worse, the lid has a small, tight lip to the can which makes it difficult to attach.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Nice trash can with swinging lid
customer_reviews.text: I like how the round kitchen trash can takes up less room but holds the same amount of trash. I love the swinging lid so if anything smells, it is contained inside the can and not smelling up my kitchen before I take it to the trash bin. I like the black color as well. Looks nice in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Penny

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: for 14 bucks this cant be beat..its not a flimsy plastic that feels like itll break easily. i wanted something with a lid that was easy to open but i couldnt get a pedal one cuz of the amount of space under the counter without being like 2 gallons which holds like 5 paper towels. perfect heigh and exactly what i needed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G.

customer_reviews.title: Great crash can BUT what's with the pricing?????
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my Mom in December for under $14, I really like it & went to buy one a couple weeks ago & it was $28. Not happening! So last week I saw they were $18 & I grabbed 2, now I see that they went up to $30 each! They are a really good buy at $14, acceptable at $18, but forget anything over that, I'll go to Walmart! These are really sturdy, easy to use & clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi A. Braford

customer_reviews.title: Great size: not too big, not too small for use in my kitchen. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Umbra swing top 10 gal. trash can is a perfect size for use in my kitchen. It is sturdy, roomy, and nice looking. It is well made. I like that it is made with a softer plastic as opposed to a hard plastic that could be easily cracked. I like the swing top lid that makes it easy to throw trash into the trash can and hides the unsightly trash that is inside. I’m satisfied with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a medium sized trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Kat V

customer_reviews.title: lid does not work properly
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this one star because the top is not designed to work properly. The lid catches on the inside of the frame every time I use it. It is possible it just damaged, but it is not worth it to try and replace it. Amazon is very limited in terms of garbage cans. I am going to go to Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: Swing Lid Doesn't Swing Closed Properly
customer_reviews.text: It was not what I had hoped it would be. When first set up, it looked nice. However the first time it was used, the swing top did not swing back. I looked to see if it was bent, but it appeared fine. Nonetheless, it continued with the same problem and never closed properly. Maybe this one just happens to be off kilter, but it's very disappointing. I would not recommend this trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I read all the positive reviews and decided to purchase. I recently downsized from a 3 bdrm duplex to a 3 room 55+ Building. Small Kitchen area this Garbage Can is just right. Highly recommend for Small apartments.
customer_reviews.author: Omogemama

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised, Quality Construction, Durable and Useful
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am very happy with this purchase. The trash-can is exactly as advertised and I have no extra positive or negative comments to add to it. It performs as it should, is sturdy as it is stated to be, and is overall a quality trash can for the price. I would recommend this product to my friends and family if they were looking for this type of product. - Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Nate Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not the biggest... but it works
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed the comments before buying and I agree its little on the small size but if you did your research you would realize that this is a 10-gallon as opposed to a 12 or 16-gal. Since there wasn't much to compare with in respect of photos (no offense to those who posted photos) I just took a chance for the price. Overall its works fine but if you know you generate a lot of trash this is not the one for you..... go bigger. If you are minimalist this works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Clayton-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do!
customer_reviews.text: This garbage can stands a little below sink height and is the perfect size for a normal kitchen. The swing opening keeps smells in the garbage (and not out) and luckily no fruit flies have gathered there due to the swing opening. The only downside is when the trash gets slightly full, it's hard to use the swing opening. The black finish looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: ESiews

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty and used
customer_reviews.text: Trash can arrived filthy, covered in animal hair and clearly used. WTF!!!!????
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Literally the perfect garbage can for small apartments
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small studio with my fiancé, 2 cats, and dog. Needless to say we don’t have a ton of room. I didn’t want to spend a lot of money on a garbage can so I searched and searched on amazon until I found this one. I was a little worried it would be TOO small but it definitely wasn’t, it’s the perfect size and fits very nicely in our kitchen area. I am very happy with this garbage can and I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nice trash can
customer_reviews.text: Love it perfect holds more trash than the rectangle trash cans and easier to pull the bag out when full I don’t have to fight with the bag which used to end up breaking where the pull ties are. Now it’s easy and it looks nice. I intended to paint it and make it look retro but didn’t get that done yet. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: JanLynn

customer_reviews.title: More of a "small" kitchen trashcan.
customer_reviews.text: This is not "large" for a kitchen trashcan if you have more than 2 people in your household I don't think it will work. One the other hand, it is a nice size to put beside a desk. It could also work in a kid's room if they like crafting. I like the swinging lid. My neighbor saw it and ordered one for her petfood.
customer_reviews.author: feli

customer_reviews.title: Very solid garbage can
customer_reviews.text: These garbage cans with swing top don’t create a completely closed seal around the rim, but it still keeps the smell inside very very well. I would have personally liked it a tad narrower and a tad taller, but still a solid product (it does what it’s supposed to after all...holds trash). Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked this style of garbage bin. It was cheaper than several with no lid, but is just as sturdy as any other I've owned. It has a small footprint, the lid is easy to remove and keeps the bag securely in place. Excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.author: ART

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a diaper pail. I wanted a trash can instead of a regular diaper pail because it can be used when they get older. It is very sturdy, I know because we fill it to the brim with dirty diapers (very heavy) and has held for 3 months and looks like it will hold for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Giesler

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This can is the perfect size, not too big or too small. It's well made and heavy for it's size. Not too heavy. Top swings open and closed from either direction. First time I've ever been thrilled with a garbage can! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Diane Hazeltine

customer_reviews.title: Great small space can or kitchen can
customer_reviews.text: Great can. Needed one for a small apartment. Would be great for a dorm for a college kid too or laundry container. It is East to clean and is just the right size to keep a standard kitchen bag. Love the lid. Has been good.
customer_reviews.author: Phillycheese

customer_reviews.title: A very durable and easy to use trash can.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice trash can for the money. When I put it the garbage bag it stays in place nicely. The lid swings back and forth without a problem when throwing away trash.. It seems to be quite durable and I am happy with the purchase, just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, The quality of the plastic is so bad. I ordered two and one arrived cracked, the second one cracked later without me even using it really. It’s a shame because it looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Mother

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price and perfect for my living conditions
customer_reviews.text: This garbage can is a perfect fit in our kitchen and I specifically needed a swing top garbage can because my father is very talented at destroying normal garbage can openings. The lid does get dirty from time to time, but a quick wipe of a paper towel and its good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Broken piece
customer_reviews.text: I found a 5”x1” piece had broken off the bottom ot the lid when I opened the package. Not worth returning so hoping I can glue it back together. Nice trash can otherwise. Even came with 2 plastic trash bags.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small dorm apartment and our kitchen isn't very big, but this garbage can serves me really well. The top is easy to remove to switch out the bags and the lid does a pretty good job of preventing odor. To reference the size, I put the Clorox wipes next to it. It's a good size if you're not producing too much garbage or else you'll have to take out the trash more often.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Yee

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I never got excited about a trash can until we got this one. It was a great price and is sturdy. Fits a standard size trash bag and has been working great since we got it! :)
customer_reviews.author: StL_Queen

customer_reviews.title: Trash Is Trash But This Is Great
customer_reviews.text: Honestly a great office add for the bang for your buck. Checked Lowes, Walmart, Home Depot that had there's for $18 etc. This was the cheapest most affordable one I found. Its trash but why spend more money on a meaningful yet meaningless item.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Trash can 1; cat 0
customer_reviews.text: I got this trashcan for my bedroom because my cat was constantly knocking my wastebasket over. On purpose. Now she knows who's she up against. It's a good size for a bedroom or office, but I would say a swing top lid is probably not the best choice if you're planning to dump food and other messy stuff in there. Good product especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Angel A

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: This works for what I needed. It’s not aesthetically beautiful if it were in a kitchen, it is after all a trash bin. I needed something to hold light sabers and toy weapons. Keeps my boys closet organized. So I’m a happy mom!
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: If you have to throw small containers like a TV dinner tray you have to put it ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this trash can because it was small but the slot where you throw the trash is not wide enough to throw more then one thing. If you have to throw small containers like a TV dinner tray you have to put it in at an angle or you'll have a mess to clean off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Valdez

customer_reviews.title: A Great Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: Great trash can! Originally bought it for use in my room. It was a great investment and nice tall and never stinked. But now its my kitchen trash and it does a great job. Excellent build quality!
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: The first one came smashed in a dinky cardboard box. The second one came in a much better sturdy cardboard box. Could use stronger plastic. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sonnak

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I taught the garbage can would of been bigger but beside that I like it very much. It doesn't take up too much space and I like the push lid.
customer_reviews.author: S.A

customer_reviews.title: Pet proof
customer_reviews.text: Great for the kitchen and any ten gallon trash bags fit perfect. Helps keeping bad smells in. Pets haven’t gotten in the trash since I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Boston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: I think this trash can is wonderful. It keeps odors in and hound dog noses out. This is a great product for dog owners!!! It's easy to keep the can clean and nice looking. Kudos
customer_reviews.author: Anne of East Texas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my kitchen, this is the only nice black trash can i could find and it did not disappoint once i received it! The little swing door is awesome i think. It gives the kitchen a bit of character and it traps the smell in there as well. I dropped the top part and the swing door came off and it was super easy to put back on! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Luv!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! I luv!! Better than expected! Cheap too... I bought a small one for my bathroom and it only cost $1 less .. WTH!??.. lol....
customer_reviews.author: martha barahona

customer_reviews.title: Good size, swing lid is annoying for kitchen use
customer_reviews.text: The size of this trashcan is great for my kitchen, but the swing top lid was a mistake. If I'm prepping food and need to throw away something wet or sticky then it either gets all over the lid or I have to go to great lengths to avoid touching the lid. After the first day, I just took the lid off and hid it in a cabinet. This kind would be much better suited to office use where you're pushing dry items like paper through the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: If you want to pot roses, this is the garbage can for you
customer_reviews.text: Just over an inch of large size nursery pots and deep, with steady footing, this garbage can is perfect for potting miniature rose bushes. Drill some holes in the bottom, and add some stone for drainage, and you have a planter that acomidates plants the like to send roots further down than they do out.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Swing door always goes closed as it should. The bags form a bit of suction when you try to remove them but not huge deal. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Mary Del Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy! Arrived in perfect condition. Lid fits perfectly to the bottom. It is made out of a thicker plastic and we will be using it as a laundry hamper.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Easily worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my bedroom! Swing door makes for easy disposal and the black color keeps it from looking dirty. Door easily comes off if needed.
customer_reviews.author: JEli28

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Item came in very squished!! Very hard to put the lid on. The box was damaged I messaged company and told me to talk to Amazon but that wasn't helpful
customer_reviews.author: Lee A.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: It looks big and that take a lot room.. it is not true.. Even in a small space you can take it and it will work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KaRod

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but difficult to clean!
customer_reviews.text: The built of this dustbin is sturdy and the material used is good. The problem is with the design of the cap. The flap gets dirty when used in the kitchen and need frequent cleaning. The cap is also difficult to remove when the bin is full without spilling the content.
customer_reviews.author: Peeyush

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know I was getting three for the price lol! For the project I got the stickers from etsy.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: Being a dark color works well for us
customer_reviews.text: We use this can outside under our covered patio and night time critters don't bother it.
customer_reviews.author: Phu Cat

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Great car trash basket for a great value. My only complaint is that I cannot find away for the bag to not show the way it looks on here. Otherwise, definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie S.

customer_reviews.title: keeps garbage
customer_reviews.text: my garbage can looks very nice in my kitchen and it fits and matches very well.
customer_reviews.author: darlene dubose

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This trash bin is a really good for 24 gallon trash bags. I sometimes find the lid a little slippery when I try to put it on. But on general a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lilesh Ingle

customer_reviews.title: Narrow lid opening.
customer_reviews.text: It isn’t as big as I thought it would be. I am constantly having to remove the lid to get big objects into the can.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: This is the second time I’ve purchased this trash can ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve purchased this trash can to use at work. This one came with the swinging part of the lid slightly bent. I’m very particular so it’s driving me crazy. I’m hoping someone may have an idea for me on how to fix it! If it wasn’t for that detail this would have 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Susan KB

customer_reviews.title: it's very robust
customer_reviews.text: The trash is very robust material, it's easy to clean ... I just didn't pay attention to the size, it's huge (and I needed a bathroom trash)
customer_reviews.author: Crislaine

customer_reviews.title: My trash actually smiles when it sees where it's going
customer_reviews.text: It's true. I go to throw something away and when they see this trash can it smiles. What more can you ask for than happy trash. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to keep outsiders on my patio. This trash bin is weather resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Mommysuz

customer_reviews.title: It's a Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: Shorter than I was expecting, but alas, it is only 10 gallons. It holds a bag and the garbage within. Swing top doesn't stick. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: OneAmongMany

customer_reviews.title: Shop Amazon
customer_reviews.text: New trash bin I needed Thank you have a bless day Manuel Lozano
customer_reviews.author: MANUEL LOZANO

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: This is sooo perfect for my kitchen. I love, love, love it! Very affordable, sturdy, easy to clean & arrived the next day. People visited my home & they ordered it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lorin

customer_reviews.title: Short trash can
customer_reviews.text: It looks great came in great and its nice and shiny. The only issue i have with this is its short. much shorter then i thought that it was going to be. Maybe thats my fault for not paying attention to the length described, but i thought that i would have something closer to a normal sized home trash can which is like 5 or 6 inches taller. But it does look very clean and modern so im making due for lack of size. Also the lid is great It takes very little to push it open to throw something away.
customer_reviews.author: HappyHeather

customer_reviews.title: simple design..
customer_reviews.text: We looked for a trash can to go into a spot. Hubby found this one and ordered it without my approval. Its a simple design and surprising I like it because it blends in with the cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: James White

customer_reviews.title: Great in any kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Sleek elegant . Easy to clean and it's heavy duty. I was pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.author: Shonda C.

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can
customer_reviews.text: Used this to motivate my teenage sister to clean her room, so far she likes it and her room is finally clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amber McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Swing top trash can.
customer_reviews.text: It’s just what we wanted! We are pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ladycreolesm

customer_reviews.title: Not convenient
customer_reviews.text: Wanna throw large item I’m not able too. The opening is too small and the led moves I have to hold it with the other hands
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love it, It was shipped fast. I love it and they delivered it to the porch like they suppose to, The product was easy to put together. I give it a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great storage unit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect place to store all the trash I don’t need. The lid swings smoothly which provides instant gratification after tossing some junk. Since purchasing this container, there has been less trash on my office desk; not sure if it’s a coincidence, but I’ve also been using more trash bags. Weird. At any rate, this purchase was a good one. I have zero regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small apartment and sturdy. Not too tall or big.
customer_reviews.author: ohemaa

customer_reviews.title: Umbra 10gal kitchen trash can swing top
customer_reviews.text: I like it just the right size my bags fit just right
customer_reviews.author: madmax

customer_reviews.title: Yes this is the answer
customer_reviews.text: I have no room under my sink. This is perfect. Also me with easy swing top. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Saint Gelais Fulk

customer_reviews.title: So cute and well made
customer_reviews.text: What a cute little kitchen refuse container. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Built sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love this trash can, it's built to last, holds alot of trash, and the swing lid comes in very handy, great value.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gove

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: Came broken even though the box was fine. Pretty small, not like the normal kitchen trash size.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Freeman

customer_reviews.title: NO LID
customer_reviews.text: This product came WITHOUT a LID. I contacted Umbra and they said they no longer have replacement lids and to contact Amazon directly. I tried to do that and it kept referring me back to the company. I guess I paid for a product that wasn’t complete. 🤬
customer_reviews.author: -shanah-

customer_reviews.title: its a garbage can, door swings well
customer_reviews.text: We needed a can with a cover. This is a can with a cover. I mean really - the fit and finish - wow. its a garbage can. its a good garbage can. I think it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Double A-Rod

customer_reviews.title: Trash Bins to Planters
customer_reviews.text: I used these as large planters for my front door. I got the idea from Pinterest and the price on large planters is ridiculous. I decorated them and filled them with rocks I had around the house to weigh them down and added fake plants. So far so good and I saved money!
customer_reviews.author: Reddfoxx007

customer_reviews.title: Short can
customer_reviews.text: Short in height. I pictured it as much taller. It works as far as functionality, but moving forwards, I will always remember to measure things before making online purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ZWhite

customer_reviews.title: Love my trash can!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this trash can. It’s a great size and good price. The trash cans with sensors just seem a bit lazy and they tend to malfunction, so this is probably your best bet.
customer_reviews.author: 🌙Katrina🌙

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described - Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this trash can. Thickness is just right. Wish it came in white also. 13 gallon liner fits perfectly. Can't comment on the lid as I don't use it. Perfect for home office and kitchen trash. Exterior is a matte black (does not have a shine.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Go to Walmart
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. I could have gotten a sturdier one at Walmart for the same price
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Norman-Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Working well
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price point. Working well in my laundry room!
customer_reviews.author: Artsy

customer_reviews.title: Great Diaper Trash Can!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this in our nursery. It’s super easy to just throw a dirty diaper in( no need to push or touch a handle) Super easy to clean and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R

customer_reviews.title: As described works great
customer_reviews.text: Great I use this in my permanent make up studio works very well
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N.

customer_reviews.title: Ideal trash can
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, somewhere in between a bathroom & kitchen sized trash can.
customer_reviews.author: NEIL

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It’s a trash can. It does it’s job well and holds trash.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Decent!
customer_reviews.text: The swing top comes off way too easily, but other than that it's a pretty decent trash can! It's easy to remove the bag, and doesn't look too cheap, so I am calling it a win.
customer_reviews.author: AGilmore

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just the size that I needed for my tiny home. Item is just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Eberhart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for the kitchen. Can't believe the price was so reasonable
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Frost

customer_reviews.title: Ya get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Cheap trash can really thin plastic, needed a cheap can so it works well
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Trash can came cracked on the bottom and a chunk missing out of the lid. Smaller than what I expected. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley landwehr

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy container but looks very cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Lid is tough to clean Looks very cheap Very sturdy container
customer_reviews.author: michael stone

customer_reviews.title: Great one for the value
customer_reviews.text: Great looking. Very sleek. Easy to remove and put trash bag in.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa O.

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's suppose to do. Decent quality at a fair price.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price

product_meta.title: Umbra 086711-040 Grand Swing Top Garbage Large Capacity 10 Gallon Kitchen Trash Can with Lid, Indoor/Outdoor Use, Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Can

Tired of small garbage cans that are always full, forcing you to replace the bag far too often? 

Introducing the Grand Garbage Can with Lid by Umbra

Grand features a stylish, hassle-free swing-top lid, that keeps your trash or recycling conveniently out of sight. Constructed from durable polypropylene, Grand is sturdy enough for everyday use, making it an excellent kitchen garbage can. Grand is also suitable for other areas around your home, office, commercial space, and even as an outdoor trash can. Designed with a large, 10-gallon capacity, the Grand trash can with lid will fit most 13-Gallon trash bags, including draw-string and flap-tie bags. To keep Grand clean, simply wipe with a damp cloth when needed. 

Stop fussing with smaller trash cans and upgrade to Grand today.

About Umbra: A global product design company providing original, modern, casual, and functional design for the home.
feature_bullets: MODERN SWING-TOP DESIGN: Grand Trash Can features a swing-top lid that fits securely in place while hiding your trash or recycling; leaving your kitchen, or other space clean and tidy
DURABLE AND EASY TO CLEAN: Grand is made of durable polypropylene that is strong and easy to clean – simply wipe with a damp cloth when needed
LARGE 10 GALLON CAPACITY: At 26-inches tall with a 13-inch diameter, the Grand garbage can was designed to hold most 13-gallon garbage bags, including draw-string and flap-tie bags
SUITABLE FOR RESIDENTIAL OR COMMERCIAL USE: Not only is Grand the perfect kitchen trash can, it’s also suitable for workshops, garages, and other areas around your home or commercial space

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED OR YOUR MONEY BACK: Umbra is committed to the highest levels of quality and excellence and stand behind every product we make. We know you’re going to love your purchase but if you’re not completely thrilled for any reason (or even no reason at all), simply contact us within 30 days of receiving your order and we’ll happily resolve the matter or issue a full refund
Material: Molded Plastic Made from Recycled Materials

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
